text: Just saw a LinkedIn Influencer with 'Organic Growth' written in the profile with 65K+ followers.
Jobseekers, this one's for you. Every application, every interview, every follow-upâ€¦ the pressure is real.
Looking for jobs on LinkedIn is like online dating: Full of promises, but in the end, you're just left on read.
LinkedIn scams be like: 'Congratulations, you've been selected for a role at our esteemed company! Just send us $50 to proceed with the application.'
sapne dekhna achi baat hai, lekin job ka sapna dekh ke 'interested' dabaana acchi baat nahi hai.
Next time when I'll be reading some LinkedIn Influencer's story, I am expecting them to say: 'I was struggling last year with zero connections. Now I own two islands.'
